title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 May 2009 - XWiki
content:

tharindu\_ - (06/05/2009 04:47): sdumitriu: Hi, with a groovy script how can we append something to a normal document. is there any Java method to log to document.  
tharindu\_ - (06/05/2009 04:47): we can append the groovy script to page by $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage()  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 04:48): doc.setContent(doc.getContent() + "new content")  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 04:48): doc.save()  
tharindu\_ - (06/05/2009 04:48): ah ok thanks :)  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 05:20): XWIKI-3770

anamarias - (06/05/2009 12:40): vmassol : i had left aside the issue for a while, but i'll get back on it  
vmassol - (06/05/2009 12:40): anamarias: do you think you can finish it in the 1.9RC1 timeframe?  
vmassol - (06/05/2009 12:40): (ie before the 18th of May)  
arunreddy - (06/05/2009 12:40): vmassol : Hi   
vmassol - (06/05/2009 12:41): arunreddy: hi  
vmassol - (06/05/2009 12:41): same question for your arunreddy   
anamarias - (06/05/2009 12:41): yes, definitely   
vmassol - (06/05/2009 12:41): cool  
arunreddy - (06/05/2009 12:41): Due to some college work and exams i could concentrate on it.  
arunreddy - (06/05/2009 12:41): Finished my exams today..   
vmassol - (06/05/2009 12:41): great hope it went well  
vmassol - (06/05/2009 12:41): :)  
arunreddy - (06/05/2009 12:41): Thanks , Did well :)   
anamarias - (06/05/2009 12:41): same here  
arunreddy - (06/05/2009 12:42): I will fix it by next release.  
anamarias - (06/05/2009 12:42): where are these dates published like for 1.9RC1 ?  
arunreddy - (06/05/2009 12:42): \*couldnt  
vmassol - (06/05/2009 12:42): here: http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/secure/Dashboard.jspa?selectPageId=10000 in the calendar  
anamarias - (06/05/2009 12:43): ah, on jira, nice  
arunreddy - (06/05/2009 12:43): vmassol : thnx  
arunreddy - (06/05/2009 12:44): what is version 1.8.3 ?  
anamarias - (06/05/2009 12:44): what does RC1 or M2 stand for ?  
vmassol - (06/05/2009 12:45): 1.8.3: http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/secure/IssueNavigator.jspa?reset=true&pid=10010&fixfor=11067  
arunreddy - (06/05/2009 12:45): RC - Release Candidate  
vmassol - (06/05/2009 12:45): RC1 = release candidate 1  
vmassol - (06/05/2009 12:45): M2 = milestone 2  
vmassol - (06/05/2009 12:45): I need to go for lunch  
vmassol - (06/05/2009 12:45): ttyl  
anamarias - (06/05/2009 12:45): ok, tnks. bye  
arunreddy - (06/05/2009 12:46): Bye  
arunreddy - (06/05/2009 12:49): xwikibot: continuous integration  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 12:51  
vmassol - (06/05/2009 13:01): search continuous integration  
vmassol - (06/05/2009 13:01): help

alexmaru - (06/05/2009 19:11): I have a little problem with the build  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 19:11):  DTD factory class org.apache.xerces.impl.dv.dtd.DTDDVFactoryImpl does not extend from DTDDVFactory.  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 19:12): does this sound familiar?  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 19:12): Never seen it  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 19:12): Where exactly does this happen?  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 19:12): at org.codehaus.classworlds.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:375)  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 19:13): No, in what module?

vnkatesh joined #xwiki at 19:14

alexmaru - (06/05/2009 19:14): java version "1.6.0\_0"

sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 19:15): http://markmail.org/thread/3cp7sdxp7i5h23ir  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 19:17): dunno exactly  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 19:18): what jdk should I use?  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 19:18): Sun JDK 1.6  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 19:18): (or 1.5)  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 19:19): OpenJDK  isn't from Sun?  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 19:20): No  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 19:21): ok, thanks

alexmaru - (06/05/2009 19:57): for artifact:   
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 19:57):   org.codehaus.mojo:aspectj-maven-plugin:maven-plugin:1.0-beta-2

alexmaru - (06/05/2009 19:58): this is missing  com.sun:tools:jar:1.4.2  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 19:58): aspectj-maven-plugin should be visible  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 19:59): It is here: http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/codehaus/mojo/aspectj-maven-plugin/1.0-beta-2/  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 19:59): Unless you didn't configure maven correctly  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 19:59): Or you had a minor network glitch  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 19:59): Try building again  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 19:59): mvn clean install -U  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 19:59): but not org.codehaus.mojo:aspectj-maven-plugin:maven-plugin:1.0-beta-2 was missing

alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:00): or it was

sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:01): Indeed, that is the artifact that is missing a requirement, not the one that is missing  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:03): Hm, strange  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:03): I think you haven't properly configured the JDK

alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:06): ubuntu 8.10

sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:09): Or something like that  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:09): I don't like Ubuntu

alexmaru left at 20:27 ("ChatZilla 0.9.84 [Firefox 3.0.3/2008101315]")  
cypromis joined #xwiki at 20:27  
alexmaru joined #xwiki at 20:41  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:42): alexmaru: Did you succeed?  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:43): I've reinstalled the jdk  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:43): for some strange reason I didn't have all the files  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:44): now it seems to work  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:45): still waiting for "build successfull"  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:45): why don't u like ubuntu?  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:45): It's full of tiny problems  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:46): It's done in a hasty manner  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:46): "Quick, the release is comming, lets put programs in it and say it's stable"  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:47): aha, I see  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:47): So, you get sound problems, skype's not working, the wrong JDK, a bunch of programs I don't need and none of the programs I need, etc  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:48): I don't like the font from my browser  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:48): and I can't change luminosity  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:49): I'm not a linux fan  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:49): but I think you can't apply patches if they are not from linux  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:50): am I right?  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:51): If I say yes, will you continue to use it?  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 20:52  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:52): I'll use linux anyway  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:54): I got a new error  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:55): a compillation error  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:55): Where?  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:57): I need to set more lines to scrollback  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:57): RROR] Errors in 'file:/home/alexandru/gsoc/trunks/web/wysiwyg/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/wysiwyg/client/plugin/sync/SyncPlugin.java'  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:57):       [ERROR] Line 438: No source code is available for type com.xpn.xwiki.gwt.api.client.dialog.MessageDialog; did you forget to inherit a required module?  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:57): Oh, GWT stuff  
sdumitriu - (06/05/2009 20:57): I don't know about that  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:58): yes, I've done a build for everything  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 20:58): :|  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 21:00): let me see if I can found out the module  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 21:05): Building XWiki Platform - Web - WYSIWYG  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 21:07): google.webtoolkit.home (gwtHome) \*not\* set, using project POM for GWT dependencies  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 21:12): I can't fin anything useful on google  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 21:12): I'll look into this tomorrow  
alexmaru - (06/05/2009 21:12): good bye :)
